name: entretien-prestige-dev
description: Complete development environment for Entretien Prestige - a mobile-first ERP system for Quebec cleaning companies built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Supabase
longDescription:
This plugin provides a comprehensive development environment for the Entretien Prestige project, including specialized agents for feature development, database architecture, testing, bug fixing, deployment, and code review. It enforces Quebec French UI standards, mobile-first design (640px), 100% test coverage, and Row Level Security for multi-tenancy.

Includes 6 specialized agents, 10 custom skills, 3 output styles, comprehensive hooks system, and complete MCP/LSP integrations.
